content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great! Could you please start by telling me the lowest price you are willing to offer for the apartment?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm looking for the highest price possible, Emilia. Let's say 1500 Euros per month to start with.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mister Schmidt. I believe we can work with that. Would you be willing to come down from 1500 Euros?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Sure, I can be flexible. Let's say 1450 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 1450 Euros is a good offer. Would you consider going lower, say, 1400 Euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 1400 Euros per month is too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Since we have not reached an agreement, I will terminate the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
